metadata.title: CVE-2019-6990 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
A stored-self XSS exists in web/skins/classic/views/zones.php of ZoneMinderthrough 1.32.3, allowing an attacker to execute HTML or JavaScript code ina vulnerable field via a crafted Zone NAME to theindex.php?view=zones&action=zoneImage&mid=1 URI.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-6990` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

zoneminder - 1.29.0+dfsg-1ubuntu2+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: zoneminder package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.29.0+dfsg-1ubuntu2+esm1').
